page.title: 08Recreation 1
page.content: { Shooting Mr.Coppin has a clay pigeon shooting club and both landowners in the Block have game shoots regularly.Bush beat- ers,who are paid Â£5,walk down fields driving game towards the guns.The game season begins on October 1st. {Fox Hunting { }During the winter months,farmers allow foxes to be hunted on their land.Riders on horseback use hounds to hunt down and kill foxes.Cubbing is also carried out against the fox but only foxcubs are sought. {Bowls The bowling green is next to the village hall and the land is provided by Mr. Roughton until such time as it is no longer used by the club. Members can regularly be seen playing or practising there during the summer months when weather permits it.
